ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Use true or false to enable or disable always online.

ANTICALL.description: Use true or false to enable or disable calls.

ANTILINK.description: Enable or disable the anti-link feature in groups.

AUTO_LIKE_EMOJI.description: Set custom emoji for auto-like status.

AUTO_LIKE_STATUS.description: Enable auto-like status with true or false.

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Enable or disable the auto-recording feature.

AUTO_TYPING.description: Enable or disable the auto-typing feature.

AUTO_VIEW_STATUS.description: Enable auto-read status with true or false.

PREFIX.description: Set your prefix. You can use `all | . | .!*`.
